documentation.title: Doc Comment
documentation.standard: Enforces several rules related to the formatting of doc comments in PHP code.
Doc comment must not be empty.

code.title: Valid: Doc comment with some content.
Invalid: Empty doc comment.

documentation.standard: The opening doc comment tag must be the only content on the line.

code.title: Valid: The opening doc comment tag is the only content on the line.
Invalid: The opening doc comment tag is not the only content on the line.

documentation.standard: The closing doc comment tag must be the only content on the line.

code.title: Valid: The closing doc comment tag is the only content on the line.
Invalid: The closing doc comment tag is not the only content on the line.

documentation.standard: There must be no additional blank lines before the closing doc comment tag.

code.title: Valid: no additional blank lines before the closing doc comment tag.
Invalid: additional blank lines before the closing doc comment tag.

documentation.standard: The doc comment must have a short description.

code.title: Valid: Doc comment with a short description.
Invalid: Doc comment without a short description.

documentation.standard: Short description must be on the first line of the doc comment.

code.title: Valid: No blank lines before the short description.
Invalid: Blank lines before the short description.

documentation.standard: The short description must start with a capital letter.

code.title: Valid: Short description starts with a capital letter.
Invalid: Short description doesn't start with a capital letter.

documentation.standard: There must be exactly one blank line between the short and long descriptions.

code.title: Valid: One blank line between the short and long descriptions.
Invalid: More than one blank line between the short and long descriptions.

documentation.standard: The long description must start with a capital letter.

code.title: Valid: Long description starts with a capital letter.
Invalid: Long description doesn't start with a capital letter.

documentation.standard: There must be one blank line before the tags.

code.title: Valid: One blank line before the tags.
Invalid: More than one or no blank line before the tags.

code_comparison.code: /** * Short description. * * * @param int $foo */ /** * Short description. * @return int */

documentation.standard: Parameter tags must be grouped together.

code.title: Valid: Parameter tags grouped together.
Invalid: Parameter tags not grouped together.

documentation.standard: Parameter tags must not be grouped together with other tags.

code.title: Valid: Parameter tags are not grouped together with other tags.

code_comparison.code: /** * Short description. * * @param int $foo * * @author Some Author * @return int */

code.title: Invalid: Parameter tags grouped together with other tags.

code_comparison.code: /** * Short description. * * @param int $foo * @author Some Author * @return int */

documentation.standard: Tag groups must be separated by a single blank line.

code.title: Valid: Single blank line separating tag groups.
Invalid: More than one blank line separating tag groups.

documentation.standard: Tag values for different tags in the same group must be aligned with each other.

code.title: Valid: Tag values for different tags in the same tag group are aligned with each other.
Invalid: Tag values for different tags in the same tag group are not aligned with each other.

documentation.standard: Parameter tags must be defined before other tags in a DocBlock.

code.title: Valid: Parameter tags are defined first.
Invalid: Parameter tags are not defined first.
